1.0.name: wordpress/add-twitter-profile-widget
1.0.description:
Twitter Profile Widget. Plugin shows your tweets on Page/Post/Widget area.

This plugin shows your twitter profile tweets under Sidebar Area (Widget), Post and/or Pages. Tweets will REFRESH AUTOMATICALLY. Also it has reply option inside widget on mouse over action. Admin panel option available under" Settings -> Twitter Profil Widget" to set different color combination and twitter widget options.

Screenshots : http://new-wordpress.us/wp-twitter-profil-widget-4/

Tags: twitter, twit, tweet, tweets, twitter widget, dynamic twitter widget, auto refresh tweet, twitter profile widget, sidebar twitter, twitter sidebar, twitter, twitter post, twitter tools, best twitter, Original Tweet profil, WP Tweet
